8 fptr 48 single_crochet round 7 willow chain 2 counts as 1st half_double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in next 2 sts 1 double_crochet in next 4 sts chain 2 over next 3 sts work 1 3dctog 5 chain 1ss half_double_crochet in next 2 sts make 1 x 3fptrtog as follows 1 fptr around 3dctog from round 5 leaving last loop on hook 1 fptr around fptr from round 6 leaving last loop on hook 1 fptr around
